ygData.subject: Re: Stacking Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Enthusiatic yes!  I have my own notes but this would be a great resource for all.  John Kim has also mentioned a bard guide.  Coordinate? ==Maravana Vireo of
ygData.messageBody:
Enthusiatic yes! I have my own notes but this would
be a great resource for all. John Kim has also
mentioned a bard guide. Coordinate?

==Maravana Vireo of Mithaniel Marr

--- JasonF <JasonF@...> wrote:
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> From the discussions that we've been having here on
> this list in the last
> three days or so, it occurred to me that what we
> need is some sort of cross
> reference of what songs stack with what. I'm only
> level 20 so it would be
> difficult for me to produce a lot of the information
> myself, but I would
> volunteer to assemble the data into a graphical
> reference or HTML table. This
> is the sort of thing that I would print out and keep
> laying around when I
> played, how about you guys 'n' gals?
>
> Crier - 20th song Bard on Fennin Ro
>
> Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
> CDI at http://www.pigging.com/
